practice_phrases: Angry
生气
Feel angry
感到生气
She feels angry
她感到生气
I don't feel angry now
我现在不感到生气
You shouldn't feel angry
你不应该感到生气
Anyone can feel angry sometimes
任何人都能有时感到生气
When I feel angry, I breathe
当我感到生气的时候，我呼吸
She doesn't want to feel angry
她不想感到生气
If you feel angry, it's a good idea to breathe slowly
如果你感到生气，慢慢呼吸是个好主意
I used to think that being angry was bad, but I was wrong
我以前认为生气是不好的，但我错了
Feel angry
感到生气
I feel angry
我感到生气
You feel angry
你感到生气
She doesn't feel angry now
她现在不感到生气
Anyone can feel angry sometimes
任何人都能有时感到生气
I don't want to feel angry
我不想感到生气
When you feel angry, breathe slowly
当你感到生气的时候，慢慢呼吸
If they feel angry, it's bad
如果他们感到生气，是不好的
Whenever I feel angry, I try to breathe slowly first
每当我感到生气的时候，我先试着慢慢呼吸
She won't feel angry unless you choose the wrong words
除非你选择错误的话，她不会感到生气
You feel angry
你感到生气
When you feel angry
当你感到生气
If you feel angry
如果你感到生气
I know you feel angry
我知道你感到生气
Whenever you feel angry, breathe
每当你感到生气，呼吸
You feel angry right now
你现在感到生气
If you feel angry, try slowly
如果你感到生气，试着慢慢
I don't care if you feel angry
我不在乎你是否感到生气
Unless you feel angry, it isn't true that breathing slowly is necessary
除非你感到生气，慢慢呼吸是必要的不是真的
When you feel angry, it's a good idea to breathe slowly
当你感到生气的时候，慢慢呼吸是个好主意
When you feel angry
你感到生气的时候
Breathe when you feel angry
你感到生气的时候呼吸
Try slowly when you feel angry
你感到生气的时候试着慢慢
I know when you feel angry
我知道你感到生气的时候
When you feel angry, breathe slowly
你感到生气的时候，慢慢呼吸
She was right about when you feel angry
她关于你感到生气的时候是对的
When you feel angry, try to breathe slowly
你感到生气的时候，试着慢慢呼吸
When you feel angry, it's a good idea to leave
你感到生气的时候，离开是个好主意
I used to think that when you feel angry, being crazy is good
我以前认为你感到生气的时候，疯狂是好的
When you feel angry, try and breathe slowly instead of choosing the wrong words
你感到生气的时候，试着慢慢呼吸而不是选择错误的话

lego: 每当你感到生气的时候
practice_phrases: Whenever you feel angry
每当你感到生气的时候
Breathe whenever you feel angry
每当你感到生气的时候呼吸
Try slowly whenever you feel angry
每当你感到生气的时候试着慢慢
Whenever you feel angry, breathe slowly first
每当你感到生气的时候，先慢慢呼吸
She was right - whenever you feel angry, try
她是对的 - 每当你感到生气的时候，试着
Whenever you feel angry, it's a good idea to breathe
每当你感到生气的时候，呼吸是个好主意
I don't care whenever you feel angry about the wrong job
每当你感到关于错误的工作生气的时候我不在乎
Whenever you feel angry, try and breathe slowly instead of being crazy
每当你感到生气的时候，试着慢慢呼吸而不是疯狂
He made a promise that whenever you feel angry, he won't listen
他承诺每当你感到生气的时候，他不会听
Whenever you feel angry.
每当你感到生气的时候。
